title: Boston: the art of a city
creator_credit: Cinemagraphics, Yale Marc and Jim Herzig
brief_description: Surveys professional, amateur, and personal cultural life of Metropolitan Boston, including the Boston Symphony Orchestra, the Boston Ballet, the Opera Company, folk dancing, singing, painting, and other activities.
description: Surveys professional, amateur, and personal cultural life of Metropolitan Boston, including the Boston Symphony Orchestra, the Boston Ballet, the Opera Company, folk dancing, singing, painting, and other activities.
